body_html: @ashishfarmer as discussed offline, when we tried to use this PR to run resnet50, we ran into Conv output mismatch when output channel = 256 (without bias). A repro is at https://github.com/petrex/pytorch/tree/hipify-operator-tests via python caffe2/python/operator_test/hip_conv_op_test.py HIPConvTest.test_simple_conv.
body_text: @ashishfarmer as discussed offline, when we tried to use this PR to run resnet50, we ran into Conv output mismatch when output channel = 256 (without bias). A repro is at https://github.com/petrex/pytorch/tree/hipify-operator-tests via python caffe2/python/operator_test/hip_conv_op_test.py HIPConvTest.test_simple_conv.
body: @ashishfarmer as discussed offline, when we tried to use this PR to run resnet50, we ran into Conv output mismatch when output channel = 256 (without bias). A repro is at https://github.com/petrex/pytorch/tree/hipify-operator-tests via `python caffe2/python/operator_test/hip_conv_op_test.py HIPConvTest.test_simple_conv`.
